description: Escaped drug kingpin Joaquín "El Chapo" Guzmán, the head of the Sinaloa cartel, is one of the most powerful, rich and feared criminals in the world. His cartel is responsible for killing thousands of people. [Related: How ‘El Chapo’ built a criminal empire — and escaped prison — by digging deep] But that reputation hasn't deterred entrepreneurial piñata-creators […]
title: These pinatas let Mexicans whack El Chapo and Donald Trump with a bat
